content.value: I remain convinced that it’s all staged to give Hancock a way out that is not directly due to the government’s (and his) disastrous handling of the pandemic. Resigning over a ‘fling’ means the blame lies with him; resigning over Covid could see the downfall of the entire lot.
content.html: I remain convinced that it’s all staged to give Hancock a way out that is not directly due to the government’s (and his) disastrous handling of the pandemic. Resigning over a ‘fling’ means the blame lies with him; resigning over Covid could see the downfall of the entire lot.
